author: Special Correspondent
text:
: French singer Erika Lernot, who spices up her Caribbean singing style with a dash of soul and jazz, is performing at Alliance Francaise on Saturday.

Lernot launched a career as a chorist for a host of lead singers touring all over the world before deciding to go solo.

Her first album ‘Le Voyage’ (the journey) was released in 2013 which has her sonic signature right through.

The standout tracks on this album include ‘Il m’aime’, the eponymous EP Le Voyage and La Vague.
title: French singer to perform on Saturday
